== HOWTO Edit a Wiki Page ==

* First thing first, you need a Launchpad Account - See this
* You then need to use your Login Details to login as shown below:

<nowiki>[[File:step1.png]]</nowiki>

* Once you login, please refresh your browser, copy this link '''https://wiki.ubuntu.com/UbuntuGNOME/Meetings/Agenda''', paste it on your address bar of whatever browser you are using and then press Enter.

<<BR>>

<nowiki>[[File:step2.png]]</nowiki>

* Please add your name, subject/topic you want to discuss and details on that subject/topic. And, you are done :)
